title: My Wish
description: Alana West has relegated decent sex to the same level as the Tooth Fairy, the Easter Bunny, and size 2 jeans. They're nice to dream about, but will never be an important part of her life. So she's completely astounded when that unusual artifact she bought at an estate sale turns out to be occupied-by two fabulously sensual Djinns, who want to do nothing but teach her how to accept her sexuality. What's a girl to do? Relax and enjoy it, of course...
author: Sahara Kelly
